kactus2:note.kactus2:content: This ICN xbar remaps addresses to CPU.
Initial core choice is IBEX RV core
TODO: Define IMEM and DMEM dimensions.
TODO: finalize needed control registers. If required, regen with Kamel-tool.

The converter bridges could be removed if XBAR is updated to use OBI standard XBAR.
Pulp project provides sample ips, but maturity not known currently.
Reduces area if taken to use.
